com.ericdaugherty.lib.configuration
Interface ConfigurationSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileSource, MemorySource
public interface ConfigurationSource

Defines the interface between the ConfigurationService, and any implementations that wish to provide access to configuration information. Please refer to the configuration package documentation for complete documentation and useage information.

Author:
Eric Daugherty (http://www.ericdaugherty.com/java/daughertylib)

Method Summary
 ConfigurationData getConfigurationData()
          Provides access to the parameters defined by the configuration source implementation.
 void initialize(ConfigurationService service, java.util.Properties properties)
          Allows the ConfigurationSource implementation to be passed parameters from an external class.
 

Method Detail

initialize

public void initialize(ConfigurationService service,
                       java.util.Properties properties)
                throws ConfigurationException
Allows the ConfigurationSource implementation to be passed parameters from an external class. This allows ConfigurationSources to be initialized from a configuration source instead of programmatically.

All ConfigurationSource implementations should have a default (no parameter) constructor.

Parameters:
service - reference to the default or named singleton instance of the ConfigurationService
properties - instance containing any source specific configuration parameters.
Throws:
ConfigurationException - thrown if the source cannot successfully be initialized with the provided parameters.

getConfigurationData

public ConfigurationData getConfigurationData()
                                       throws ConfigurationException
Provides access to the parameters defined by the configuration source implementation.

Configuration sources should (re)load configuration information when this method is called. This method will only be called when the ConfigurationService wants new configuration information from a source.

Throws:
ConfigurationException - thrown if the source cannot return the requested configuration data.
